title: Create Test Suite for Profile Finder
description:
Build comprehensive test suite with real-world problem cases.
        
Test Cases:
1. Name contamination tests:
   - "Pascual Estrada" should not match "Joselyn Estrada Pascual"
   - "Kelly O'Neill" should not match "Arianna Bonné"
2. Company validation tests:
   - Same person, different company (reject)
   - Company with abbreviations (accept if aliased)
3. Edge cases:
   - Names with special characters (O'Neill, García)
   - Single-word companies
   - People who changed companies recently

Implementation:
- 50+ test cases based on actual failures
- Performance benchmarks
- Success rate tracking
acceptance_criteria: 50+ test cases covering all known issues
Automated test runner in Google Apps Script
